text: Alstrom syndrome is an autosomal recessive multisystem disorder caused by mutation in ALMS1 (2p13). Very few cases of same are reported so far of same. We report a case of Alstrom syndrome (AS) who presented with type II diabetes mellitus and portal hypertension. Unilateral anorchia with hypergonadotropic hypogonadism is another unique feature of our case.
title: Alström Syndrome with Portal Hypertension.
journal: The Journal of the Association of Physicians of India
